Gavin Fay & Ashleigh Novak Welcome to our book of magical secrets. This is the lab manual for the Fay Lab at the University of Massachusetts Dartmouth School for Marine Science and Technology.
The focus of our work centers around developing interdisciplinary modeling approaches to extend the scope of applications for fisheries and ecosystem-based management. More about our groupâ€™s research activity can be found on our website. This lab manual resource is intended to provide an overview for lab members and others about how we do our work, and our expectations for our team. It is also a space ...
